https://tmrev.io/movie/115483-Blessed Are Those Who Thirst 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wvEmoaOxqfYEstLDK28Iub60otN.jpg Adapted from a novel by Norway's justice minister Anne Holt. Lesbian policewoman Hanne Wilhelmsen (Kjersti Elvik), who has a live-in lover, tools about Oslo on her Harley-Davidson. After a number of women vanish, police find blood but no bodies, and Wilhelmsen begins a search for the suspected serial killer. Blessed Are Those Who Thirst
